Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバ……あいつがトーマを使って、 私の家族を滅茶苦茶にした……許せない……
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva... She had Tohma break my family into pieces... It's unforgivable...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバのような考えを持つ人が いなくならない限り、種族の争いも消えない……
Entry.EnglishText: So long as there are those who share her ideology, racial conflicts will never disappear.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>……これ以上、ジルバの思い通りに させないためにも……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... So that Zilva won't get her way...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの親父さんとおふくろさんの ためにも……ユリスをぶっ倒そうぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: And for the sake of your mom and dad... let's kick Yuris's ass!
